data.title: Christian Sites in Egypt
data.meta_description: While Muslims certainly account for the majority of the country’s population, there are numerous awe-inspiring Christian sites in Egypt. Come Explore!
data.text:
Monastery of Saint Paul – A Coptic Wonder Of The Desert

Make your dreams come alive; explore the desert; experience life in oases, and head for the hills to explore the spectacular cave built Monastery of Saint Paul.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/id:27121f48ce020d9556e7617360e1d78d/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Monastery-of-Saint-Paul-Eastern-Desert-Egypt.jpg 445 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-04-04 01:26:372024-03-26 14:39:05Monastery of Saint Paul – A Coptic Wonder Of The Desert

Monastery Of Saint Anthony – A Gem In The Red Sea Mountains

Prepare for a venture into a medieval world where Coptic Christian rituals have remained unchanged for more than 16 centuries – visit the Eastern Desert’s Monastery of Saint Anthony.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/id:2463a23bd27d947eababf6f8f427156f/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Monastery-of-Saint-Anthony-Eastern-Desert-Egypt-Photo-by-Berthold-Werner.jpg 481 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-04-04 01:24:062024-03-26 14:38:44Monastery Of Saint Anthony – A Gem In The Red Sea Mountains

Monastery Of St. Simon The Tanner – A Haven In The Urban Sprawl

Hidden amongst the vast urban sprawl of modern day Cairo, lies a very unique religious site known as the Monastery of St. Simon the Tanner (Monastery complex of St. Sama'an), and it’s a real gem.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/process:3023/id:4379b040b2c5e8d34e82fcbc189d7f29/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Rock-carving-in-the-Monastery-of-St.-Simon-the-Tanner-Photo-by-Roland-Unger.jpg 473 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-03-17 01:51:592024-03-26 11:11:54Monastery Of St. Simon The Tanner – A Haven In The Urban Sprawl

The Church Of St. George – A Gem In The Heart Of Old Cairo

Located right in the very heart of Old Cairo, In the Coptic Compound, one will find the delightful old Church of St. George, and it really is well worth a visit.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/id:9f0cf1f246e70d985cc9c1011fd96710/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Church-Of-St.-George-Photo-by-Berthold-Werner.jpg 542 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-03-17 01:38:412024-03-26 11:12:42The Church Of St. George – A Gem In The Heart Of Old Cairo

Church Of St. Barbara – A Resting Place For The Holy Family

With so many sites to visit in Egypt, one would be forgiven for overlooking places like the Church of St. Barbara, but it honestly is a little gem worth seeing.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/process:3124/id:442be08f96eb30f586d4b4030a22d4b2/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Church-of-St.-Barbara-Cairo.jpg 473 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-03-17 01:36:542024-03-26 11:13:17Church Of St. Barbara – A Resting Place For The Holy Family

Visiting Ben Ezra Synagogue in Old Coptic Cairo

Considering that Egypt has been home to so many different cultures and religions, it’s not surprising to see the ancient Ben Ezra Synagogue at the heart of Cairo City.

https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/process:14900/id:ca74f176a7ca7fe14c8eead5aad35f6c/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/Ben-Ezra-Synagogue.jpg 480 710 Amar Mahallati https://mlrhpz8jmuut.i.optimole.com/cb:Ie5o.50122/w:auto/h:auto/q:mauto/f:best/ig:avif/https://www.egypttoursplus.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/egypt-tours-plus.png Amar Mahallati2014-03-17 01:24:412024-03-26 11:13:56Visiting Ben Ezra Synagogue in Old Coptic Cairo
